name: Princess Curse
description:
The princess was walking around in the forest. Then she found a lone house, she was looking around there till accidentally she toppled the witch cauldron. The witch saw what the princess did and she was really angry and then cursed the princess.

The princess was turned into the stone. She need our help to dispel the witch cursed and make the princess back to normal. What we are going to do to help the poor princess?

Play this funny game, it's interesting and easy to play in your spare time.

Feel free to try the game

You can purchase this game and host it on your own website.
